Text: Weelky UpdateThanksgiving day storm never fails that wind and weather arrive for holiday Crews worked good part of day but were able to get customers restored for turkey dinners OPUC denied customer advocacy groups request for reconsideration of rate increase Staff did request that we consider smoothing the rate increase by financing over longer period of time and keeping rates higher rather than decreasing as prices come down Working to analyze options and determine if Enron and NW Natural would allow given increased debt that would be required in shortterm Would like to at least give some customers option of having this choice if financials look neutral and approvals can be obtained Enron uncertainty is creating problems with our issuing of debt Have call scheduled with corporate to discuss this week Allegheny Energy Supply Co temporarily limited trading to prompt month because PGE is an affliate of Enron After discussion of OPUC ringfence trading was reinstated The market is experiencing increased trading outside of EnronOnLine PGE is no longer allowed to transact with Dynegy

Fwd Slides for StanHere are the slides you requesteda few talking points as mentioned by Jim are on the th pagelet me know if youd like more information or a different format Date Mon Nov From Jim Piro To PEGGY FOWLER Subject Slides for Stan MimeVersion ContentType multipartmixed boundaryCBFBF the fourth slide in the presentation are the notes stan can use to talk from PGE Resultsppt
